title: Hull fair: Horror as woman hurled from ride leaving 'lots of blood' at scene
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Click to play Tap to play

Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

A young woman has been dashed to hospital after falling from a funfair ride.

Horrified witnesses said the Airmaxx 360 at Hull Fair had "just set off" when the woman plunged to the ground.

Humberside Police confirmed the woman has been rushed to hospital.

"It’s been shut and the emergency services are there. There is a lot of blood. It doesn’t look good," said one witness.

Others say the woman "looked young" and fell up to 10-15 feet.

"We saw someone fly off from a 10/15ft high bouncing ride at Hull Fair whilst we were in the queue," read one tweet.

A spokesman for Humberside Police said: "We’re currently in attendance with Hull City Council at an incident at Hull Fair where a woman was injured after falling off a ride. She’s been taken to hospital for treatment.

Have you been affected by this story? Contact webnews@trinitymirror.com

"Please be patient as we work to establish the circumstances around this. Two rides are closed."

The Sizzler is the other ride shut.

Pictures show a heavy police and paramedic presence at the attraction.

According to people at the scene when it happened, police and paramedics were straight at the scene.

The Air Maxx, one of this year's main attractions, got stuck mid-air on the weekend.

The 360-degree pendulum ride dangled upside down for a short time.

The fair has been contacted for comment.
description: The woman at Hull Fair fell from the Airmaxx 360 and Humberside Police and Hull City Council are in attendance
